overview: Na-hee spends a day with alcohol after parting with her lover, Ji-hoon. Min-yeong knows and tries to take care of Na-hee. However, Na-hee does not forget Ji-hoon, and in fact, Ji-hoon and Min-yeong, who was former partner, have a relationship with Ji-hoon, who came to Na-hee. Na-hee, who is not aware of this fact, contacts Ji-hoon again, asking for forgiveness.
title: Girlfriend's Taste 2
